Package org.microcol.gui.event

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChangeLanguageListener
    Listener for change language event.
    FocusedTileListener  
    GameEventListener  
    MicrocolListener<E>
    This interface helps to avoid creating lot of listeners that just listen to one event.
    MicrocolListenerVoid
    Represents event without any parameters.
    MoveUnitListener
    Listener is called when user of AI decide to play a move.
    NewGameListener
    New game listener.
    NextTurnListener
    Listener is called when new round starts.
    ShowGridListener  
    StatusBarMessageController
    Register status bar message listeners.
    StatusBarMessageListener
    Lister inform about status message change.
    TurnStartedListener
    Listen to new turn.
    VolumeChangedListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChangeLanguageController
    Allows to trigger change language event and manage event listeners.
    ChangeLanguageEvent  
    ChangeLanguageListenerPreferences  
    ChangeLanguageListenerText
    Class connect changing of language to resource bundle.
    ExitGameEvent  
    FocusedTileController  
    FocusedTileEvent
    Contains info about focused
    GameController
    Exchange events between model and GUI.
    GameEventController  
    GameEventListenerImpl  
    KeyController
    Allow to register key listener and fire key events.
    MoveUnitController
    Controller allows to register unit moving listeners and fire events.
    NewGameController
    Allows to trigger new game event and manage event listeners.
    NextTurnController
    It's called when human user should start play his move.
    ShowGridController  
    ShowGridEvent
    Contains information if grid should be displayed.
    ShowGridListenerPreferences
    Class just pass changed showing of grid to preferences.
    StatusBarMessageControllerImpl
    Register status bar message listeners.
    TurnStartedController
    Allows to trigger new game event and manage event listeners.
    ViewController
    Process events related to view of game.
    VolumeChangeController  
    VolumeChangedListenerPreferences
    Class just pass changed volume to preferences.
    VolumeChangeEvent
    Contains new volume value.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ChangeLanguageController.Priority
    Priority allows to call high priority events as first.
